title: Playoffs And Play-Ins
description: Hot Takedown looks at the start of the NHL and NBA playoffs. Plus: a Rabbit Hole that puts age before beauty in MLB.
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
